CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper July 15, 1950, pg. 6, reads: "Present Video to YMCA - While one of the young members of the YMCA boys' lobby looks on, James O. Dougan, chairman of the YMCA boys' lobby committee, is presented with a Stromberg-Carlson video set for the youngsters by members of the Francis Street Friendly Circle Club Friday. Left to right: Lullene Hall, chairman of the circle's flower committee; Edith Adams, the circle's treasurer; James O. Dougan, Beatrice Saunders, chairman of the circle's benefit tea to buy the set, and Mrs. Roma Hatcher, founder and honorary president of the circle. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Francis Street Friendly Circle Club members Lullene Hall, Edith Adams, Beatrice Saunders, and Roma Hatcher gathered around boy wearing cowboy sweater, and James O. Dougan with Stromberg-Carlson television set, in Centre Avenue YMCA
